questions.question: Is there advice you can give to people interested in Judo or maybe to Jiu-Jitsu gym owners?
How would you compare the two arts from the perspective of people just interested about both arts?
How do you compare the two arts, the actual practice of it, and why it might be useful to you?
But be passionate about it, understand you're gonna fail, understand you're gonna get knocked down, beat up, right?
I, if I didn't know it, I brought somebody in to tell me, what am I doing wrong?
